IC.AST

Class Statement

  • java.lang.Object
    • IC.AST.ASTNode
      • IC.AST.Statement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Assignment, Break, CallStatement, Continue, If, LocalVariable, Return, StatementsBlock, While

    public abstract class Statement
extends ASTNode
    Abstract base class for statement AST nodes.
    Author:
    Tovi Almozlino
